parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attempts to move given waypoint to a random position inside a circle with the given center and radius. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> If you are looking for the command to set precise WP position, see [[setWPPos]]</value></part></template><br>
The waypoint will be placed similar to <tt>"NONE"</tt> attribute in [[setVehiclePosition]], even if the radius is 0, which means it could still be off center. In order to force waypoint to the exact position, similar to <tt>"CAN_COLLIDE"</tt> attribute, use negative radius, like -1 for example. You will probably laugh at this, but be warned:
<template lineStart="1"><title> Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> When using negative radius, the center position supplied must be [[PositionASL]], only then the resulting [[waypointPosition]] will be in format [[PositionAGL]] and not buried under the ground ¯\_(ツ)_/¯</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''setWaypointPosition''' [center, radius]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [center, radius]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> center: [[PositionAGL]] or [[Object]] (or [[PositionASL]] if the radius is negative)
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] - random placement radius in meters. Set it to -1 and convert center to [[PositionASL]] for the exact center placement.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[setWaypointPosition]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] [[player]], 0];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Exact placement (see description): <code>_wp [[setWaypointPosition]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPosASL]] [[player]], -1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypointPosition]], [[setWPPos]], [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 14, 2018 - 22:52 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:killzone_kid|killzone_kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">If you want AI to understand height of the waypoint, for example set waypoint at the top of Military Cargo Tower, use Example 2, with position in ASL format and -1 radius.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
